`<p>here's an apostrophe & a quote "</p>`

	<p>here's an apostrophe & a quote "</p>
{:}

	<p>here's an apostrophe & a quote "</p>
{:lang=xml}

	<p>here's an apostrophe & a quote "</p>
{:html_use_syntax=true lang=not_supported}

	<p>here's an apostrophe & a quote "</p>
{:html_use_syntax=true lang=xml}
